title: ShareThis Share Buttons
shortDescription: Enable one-click sharing to start scaling your site traffic.
longDescription: ShareThis – the original embeddable share buttons. We’ve rebuilt our buttons from the ground up, and they’re better than ever. Try them today!
author: ShareThis Inc

language.title: What language should the CMP display in?

global_consent.title: Which user should be asked for consent? (This displays the CMP when they appear on the page for the first time)

purposes.description:
How will you use customer data?
In addition to vendors who collect data via your site, you may also collect user data for your own purposes and require consent or claim a legitimate interest.

purpose_1.description: Do you access information on the device such as cookies or other online identifiers? (do you “place cookies” on user devices when they visit your site?)
purpose_1.title: Purpose 1. Store and/or access information on a device

purpose_10.description: Do you use data collected on your site visitors to improve your systems or software or create new products?
purpose_10.title: Purpose 10. Develop and improve products

purpose_2.description: Do you serve ads on your site based on the content the user is viewing, the app used, location. etc.?
purpose_2.title: Purpose 2. Select basic ads

purpose_3.description: Do you create personalised advertising profiles associated with users on your site (ie: profiles based on demographic information, location, user’s activity?)
purpose_3.title: Purpose 3. Create a personalised ads profile

purpose_4.description: Do you show ads to users based on this user profile?
purpose_4.title: Purpose 4. Select personalised ads

purpose_5.description: Do you build a personalised content profile for users of your site, ie: you show personalized content to users based on their profile and interests?
purpose_5.title: Purpose 5. Create a personalised content profile

purpose_6.description: Do you serve personalized content to the user based on their profiles?
purpose_6.title: Purpose 6. Select personalised content

purpose_7.description: Do you measure the performance of advertisements on your site?
purpose_7.title: Purpose 7. Measure ad performance

purpose_8.description: Do you measure the performance of content served to your site visitors?
purpose_8.title: Purpose 8. Measure content performance

purpose_9.description: Do you use the information on ads viewed on your sites and the audiences for market research?
purpose_9.title: Purpose 9. Apply market research to generate audience insights

purposes.title: Purpose Selection

enumNames.global: Global: publisher consent = 1st party cookie; Vendors consent = 3rd party cookie
enumNames.publisher: Service: publisher consent = 1st party cookie; Vendors consent = 1st party cookie

message.description: Add this code to your site's HTML where you want the buttons to show
message.title: Placement Code (optional)

failure.message: There was an error communicating with ShareThis.

proposedApp.title: ShareThis Share Buttons
proposedApp.shortDescription: Grow your site traffic by enabling one-click sharing
proposedApp.longDescription:
ShareThis Share Buttons allows you to expand the reach of your content organically and grow your audience. Make it easy for your audience to share your content across 40+ of the most popular social channels including Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and Pinterest. 

- Configure your buttons to stay anchored on the sidebar as visitors scroll or inline near your headline or product on the page for ideal visibility
- Customize the design including the alignment, size, and color to match your brand
- Increase social shares with our responsive, lightweight, code which loads asynchronously and won’t slow down your site.
- Select your preferred language from over 15 options (English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Dutch, Arabic, Bengali, Hindi, Turkish, and Vietnamese).
proposedApp.instructions:
1. On the left sidebar of your Cloudflare dashboard page, click on “Websites“. A list of your websites will appear and select the domain that you wish to install ShareThis tools.
2. Once you’ve selected the website, search for “Apps” on your left sidebar and click on it. Then, search for “ShareThis Share Buttons” on the “Search Apps” field.
3. Click on the ShareThis Share Buttons App and click on “Preview on your site” to start the installation process.
4. In the first step, you will be required to Login or Create a ShareThis Platform account. Then you can choose which of the following tools you wish to enable on your website, simply check the box and additional customization options will display: Inline Share Buttons, Sticky Share Buttons & Consent Management Platform
5. Once you’ve finished customizing your ShareThis tools, click on “Finish installing on your site“.
proposedApp.author: ShareThis Inc
